examples: The enemy army came nearer and nearer

definitions.text: not far distant in time or space or degree or circumstances
examples: a near hit by the bomb
the near or nigh horse is the one on the left
the animal's left side is its near or nigh side
very close (or near) with his money

definitions.text: with or in a close or intimate relationship
examples: my sisters and brothers are near and dear

definitions.text: near in time or place or relationship
examples: as the wedding day drew near
don't shoot until they come near
getting near to the true explanation
don't get too close to the fire

definitions.text: (of actions or states) slightly short of or not quite accomplished; all but
examples: the baby was almost asleep when the alarm sounded
the car all but ran her down
virtually all the parties signed the contract
I was near exhausted by the run
